about_the_game:
WordSearch is the classic game of finding words in a grid of characters. Every level is random. Every level uses a random subject and picks random words for that subject. The placement of the words on the grid are random too. Therefore you won't play the same level twice. Use your mouse to select the words in the grid.

This mini-game has 25 subjects and a collection of words per subject.

When you buy and install this DLC, the mini-game will appear on the main menu as an option in the games list.
Click or touch the game in the games list to start a new level.

Touchscreen Support

Woohoo! - Game "WordSearch" supports touchscreens. You can also use a stylus pen or your finger to select words in the grid.
(Touchscreen-enabled laptop or tablet required.)
